DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate residual limb fluid volume , gait , prosthesis use , perceive comfort , satisfaction prosthesis affect size prosthetic socket . Subjects test wear nominal socket 1 month wear slightly oversized socket 1 month .
DOC.criteria: transtibial amputee least 18 month post amputation 18 year age capable treadmill walk 90 second continuous stand skin breakdown residual limb
